gameConditionDef.label: stars are right
gameConditionDef.letterText: The planets of the system have aligned. Otherworldly bodies seem to call to your colonists.
gameConditionDef.description: The planets of the system have auspiciously aligned. Plants and animals will flourish and cult sacrifices will receive bonuses.
gameConditionDef.endMessage: Celestial bodies are no longer in alignment.

gameConditionDef.label: stars are wrong
gameConditionDef.letterText: Unbound to the proper order of the cosmos, the stars themselves seem to sting our eyes with a hateful scorn.
gameConditionDef.description: Unbound to the proper order of the cosmos, the stars themselves seem to sting our eyes with a hateful scorn. Sacrifices are discouraged during this period.
gameConditionDef.endMessage: The stars as we know them have returned

GameConditionDef.label: blood moon
GameConditionDef.letterText: One of the moons of this planet is orbiting in front of the sun. It is a blood moon.
GameConditionDef.description: One of the moons has taken on a mysterious hue, and a newly crimson sky drowns out the soothing colors of livelier days.
